evidence.claim: Uses AWS for cloud infrastructure, including Lambda for serverless functions and S3 for storage.
Committed to HIPAA compliance and follows HL7 standards for health data exchange.
Integrates with EHR systems using FHIR APIs.
Supports various integration patterns including REST APIs and webhooks for data exchange.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of handling X12 transactions or use cases relevant to clearinghouse operations found.
